subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Message-based usage cap, significantly higher than free tier and rate-limited during peak demand (est. ~80 messages per 3 hours on GPT-4o).
Message-based usage cap, estimated 5x the usage of the free tier.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Estimated 5-8% of total active user base across major platforms.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price war driven by new, highly efficient models (e.g., DeepSeek, Gemini Flash, Claude Haiku), leading to a significant drop in cost-per-token, especially for input. Output token costs remain 3-5x higher than input costs. The market is stratifying into flagship 'reasoning' models and ultra-efficient 'worker' models.
